activities: Indeed is a search engine for jobs and uses personal data received from its users to help the job seeker find a job, get in touch with the right employer, improve the job application process and give feedback regarding previous employers. This data includes, but is not limited to: name, email address, and resume or curriculum vitae. Indeed, Inc. formally receives such job seeker data from Indeed Ireland Operations Ltd., for whom Indeed, Inc. provides a wide range of technical services. Additionally, Indeed has employees in several European countries (Indeed Ireland Operations Ltd., or one of its subsidiaries in the EU/EEA that provide sales support services or other services for Indeed Ireland Operations Ltd.), and these employees share information with Indeed, Inc.  This data includes, but is not limited to: name, address, email address, birth date, Tax ID, phone number and other information as required by local laws.
address: 7501 N. Capital of Texas Hwy, Building B
eucountries: France, Germany, Ireland, Netherlands, United Kingdom
personaldata: customer, client, and organization. Persons that want Indeed to facilitate their job search give Indeed: telephone, physical and email addresses.
